articles.author: Laura M. MacLatchy, Dan Peppe and and Kieran McNulty
articles.title: New Research Forces a Rethink of Ape Evolution – The Wire Science - The Wire Science
articles.description: Because the timing of the assembly of Africa’s grassland habitats underlies many evolutionary hypotheses, our discovery that they existed much earlier than expected calls for a recalibration of those ideas.
articles.content:
An ape that lived 21 million years ago was used to a habitat that was both grassy and wooded. Photo: Corbin Rainbolt
Human evolution is tightly connected to the environment and landscape of Africa, … [+9815 chars]
